title: Bubbly Watch Face For Moto 360
summary: provides a perfect choice for lovers of Digital Watch with Weather info
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: This beautiful watch face turn your Moto 360 into futuristic weather widget with beautifully placed text and weather icons.This Digital watch face unites classic design with modern smart watch functionality. This Watch Face offers a variety of customization options, so you can adapt the watch face to your personal style and preference.Frillroid focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Military / police / Aviator Watch Face • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
This beautiful watch face turn your Moto 360 into futuristic weather widget with beautifully placed text and weather icons.This Digital watch face unites classic design with modern smart watch functionality. This Watch Face offers a variety of customization options, so you can adapt the watch face to your personal style and preference.
Frillroid focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Military / police / Aviator Watch Face
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.
Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
